name: Association of Manufacturers and Formulators of Enzyme Products
membership:
IECG (International Enzymes Co-ordination Group)
EU Specialty Food Ingredients
goal:
The Association of Manufacturers and Formulators of Enzyme Products - Amfep - is a non-profit European industry association created in 1977.

Our mission is to contribute to a comprehensible and workable regulatory environment for enzymes, which the exception of pharmaceutical and dietary, which provides legal certainty to our members and our customers.
interests: Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food Enzymes Regulation 1332/2008; REACH; CLP; Nagoya Protocol Implementation
Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, FIAP Regulation (EU) No 1331/2008 to 1334/2008
